The famous romance of Tarsis and Zelie. Digested into ten books. / VVritten originally in French, by the acute pen of a person of honour. ; Done into English by Charles Williams, Gent. Tarsis et Zelie. English. 1685 Le Vayer de Boutigny, M. (Roland), 1627-1685. Williams, Charles, 17th cent.
[4], 330 p.
Printed for Nathanael Ponder at the Peacock in the Poultry, London, : 1685.
Item at reel 2173:11 incorrectly identified as Wing 1797A. Reproductions of originals in the British Library and Bodleian Library.
=======

[4], 330 p.
Printed for Nathanael Ponder at the Peacock in the Poultry, London, : 1685.
